content: first stitch of the next row before i turn my work then i turn and complete the stitch it s easier to distinguish the front and back loops while you re still looking at the top or rs of the stitch you will be working into fig 2a tch bumps indicated by dark yellow and lime green markers fig 2b hook is inserted in tch bump blo of next stitch with yo ready to complete pl-single_crochet or pl- slip_stitch connector fig 2c yo has been pulled up to complete a pl- slip_stitch connector continue pulling thru the remaining 2 loops on the hook to complete a pl-single_crochet yo again and pull thru the remaining 3 loops on the hook fig 2 pl-single_crochet connector stitch has been completed dark yellow marker at the lime green marker you will work a pl-slip_stitch connector then finish the row with a slip_stitch in the last marked stitch orange marker faux mistake rib touque © 2022 ~ aunt zany ~ 7/18/2022 ~ page 5 of 7 hat chart pl x xpl x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x27 t t t t t t t t t 6 26x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x t t t t t t t t t 5 45 5 x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x26 t t t t t t t t t 4 29x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x t t t t t t t t t 3 50 2 x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x29 t t t t t t t t t 2 5 29x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x t t t t t t t t t 1 ◁ ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° 52 51 50 49 48 47 46 45 44 43 42 41 40 39 38 37 36 35 34 33 32 31 30 29 28 27 26 25 24 23 22 21 20 19 18 17 16 15 14 13
